message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "We analyzed data from the World Bank Enterprise Survey and found that small and medium enterprises in Africa face significant barriers to accessing finance.", "dataset": ["World Bank Enterprise Survey"], "topic": ["Financial Sector", "Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the Bangladesh Demographic and Health Survey, we examine the relationship between women’s empowerment and child nutrition outcomes.", "dataset": ["Bangladesh Demographic and Health Survey"], "topic": ["Nutrition", "Gender"]}, {"sentence": "This study utilizes satellite imagery data from the European Space Agency (ESA) Sentinel-2 mission to analyze land use changes in Latin America over the past decade.", "dataset": ["European Space Agency (ESA) Sentinel-2 mission"], "topic": ["Environment", "Urban Development"]}, {"sentence": "We combine household survey data from the National Census of Agriculture and the Tanzania National Panel Survey to estimate farmers’ adoption rates of new maize varieties.", "dataset": ["National Census of Agriculture", "Tanzania National Panel Survey"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "We use panel data on firms in low-income countries from the World Bank Enterprise Survey to evaluate the effect of corruption on firm performance.", "dataset": ["World Bank Enterprise Survey"], "topic": ["Governance", "Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "Our analysis is based on a dataset of energy access in rural India collected by the Council on Energy Environment and Water (CEEW) and shows how local policies can significantly improve electricity access for the poor.", "dataset": ["Council on Energy Environment and Water (CEEW)"], "topic": ["Energy", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "Combining information from the Demographic and Health Survey and the Multiple Indicator Cluster Survey, this study explores the determinants of child marriage in Sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["Demographic and Health Survey", "Multiple Indicator Cluster Survey"], "topic": ["Gender", "Social Sustainability and Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze a unique dataset of social media activity during the 2013 Colorado floods to explore how people communicate during natural disasters.", "dataset": ["social media activity during the 2013 Colorado floods"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management", "Digital Development"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the World Bank's Doing Business report and the Global Gender Gap Index, we examine the relationship between gender equality and entrepreneurship in South Asia.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Doing Business report", "Global Gender Gap Index"], "topic": ["Gender", "Financial Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "We use satellite imagery data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service and crop yield data collected by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development of Vietnam to investigate the effects of climate change on rice production.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service", "Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development of Vietnam"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Agriculture and Food"]}]
